content: क्षुण्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [क्षुद्-क्त] {@--1@} Pounded, crushed to pieces, bruised. {@--2@} Powdered, pulverized, ground. {@--3@} Beaten, trodden (as a path); <ls>R. 1. 17.</ls> {@--4@} (Fig.) Practised, followed; क्षुद्रजनक्षुण्ण एष मार्गः <ls>K. 146</ls>; अ° unusual; <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--5@} Violated (a vow). {@--6@} Exercised, practised, skilful. {@--7@} One versed in the sacred science but unable to teach it. {@--8@} Overcome, defeated.
